level.heading: Governing law.
level.text: The law of the District shall govern the:
Internal affairs of a statutory trust;

Liability of a beneficial owner as beneficial owner , a trustee as trustee, and a person appointed, elected, or engaged under § 29-1201.03(e)(8) or (9) for a debt, obligation, or other liability of a statutory trust or a series thereof; and
Enforceability of a debt, obligation, or other liability of the statutory trust or a series thereof against the property of the trust or any series thereof.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "a trustee as trustee, and a person appointed, elected, or engaged under § 29-1201.03(e)(8) or (9)" for "and a trustee as trustee" in (2).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 301 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
